Articles.Content: Today, I was loading Ksp When it finish loading I heard the singing hill duna noise. It was pretty weird and did you Guys heard that too.
Most likely a sound bug. Some files may be corrupted and cause the game to load the file. Has it happened more than once?
It was happened to me too a lot. But I have tons and tons of mods, so I don`t know if its Squad`s mistake or a mod with bad compatibles.

Do you have Chatterer installed ? It makes this noise sometime but you can deactivate it.

EDIT: It's called SSTV and generally have a frequency of one time every 180 seconds or so.

Edited September 14, 2013 by Alavarien-46

It's a random bug that seems to come up occasionally, I remember a thread a while back from someone that (pretty much) left the star system and they got the Duna signal.

Not sure what causes it or how to get it to repeat itself though.
